content:
User: Time Savings: No need to onboard a new AI from scratch. Even with a single prompt, explaining the tagging system and context takes effort—DeepSearch skips that step.

Grok: The Fix: The attachment issue is the only blocker. Since you’ve onboarded chats with text prompts, we’ll bypass attachments by pasting the transcript text directly into the prompt. This worked for onboarding, so it should work here.
